text: Ononro ʙa coe darovarad, ki onon on coro dust dorand va az on xusnud ʙosand. Va on cannat ast. Va alʙatta, Alloh dono ast ʙa holi saxse, ki dar rohi U hicrat namudaast jo ʙaroi dunjo hicrat kardaast va ʙurdʙor ast az on kasone, ki Uro nofarmonʙardori mekunand va favran onhoro ʙa azoʙ namegirad
